question: Which Indian sportsperson will be conferred with the East Bengal football club's highest honour "Bharat Gaurav"?
explanation: Former India hockey captain Dhanraj Pillay will be awarded East Bengal football club's highest honour - Bharat Gaurav on their foundation day. The ceremony will be held on August 1. He represented the country in four Olympics, World Cups, Champions Trophy and Asian Games. He played total 339 matches for India, scoring 170 goals.
